text: Wan Mokhtar bin Wan Ahmad (21 March 1932 â€“ 21 September 2020) was a Malaysian politician. He was the 11th Menteri Besar of Terengganu and Member of the Terengganu State Legislative Assembly (MLA) for Cukai from September 1974 to December 1999. He was a member of the United Malays National Organisation (UMNO). Mokhtar was born in Kuala Terengganu, Indonesia. He was a friend of the former Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. Mokhtar died on 21 September 2020 in Kuala Lumpur from problems caused by heart disease, aged 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Malaysian politicians Category:People from Terengganu
title: Wan Mokhtar
